channel.title: Is there a muteuser for testscape?
channel.description: like a muteuser command? because the report button doesnt work, like when you click mute for 48 hours. and, if there happens to be a code to make the report button then mute, please let me know thanks :), llama man111

item.title: Is there a muteuser for testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

ummmmmmmmmmm…this is easy…(at least for me)

ok all you gotta do is get the code for muteing a user…

and add it in your cmds…

then when in game you just type ::muteuser (playername)
and that player is muted…

to get code try lescapes code factory…

Read full topic
